intro: Haworthia marginata var. ramifera, commonly known as the ramifera Haworthia, is a compact, succulent plant native to southern Africa. It features rosettes of thick, fleshy leaves that are typically green with white or pale green markings. The leaves are often adorned with intricate, radial patterns that give the plant a striking appearance. It produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow or orange during the warmer months. This species is well-suited for indoor cultivation due to its low maintenance and ability to thrive in bright, indirect light.
